content: I have a few jewelry boxes and pouches, but they're not very organized. I think I'll invest in a jewelry organizer with separate compartments and dividers. That way, I can store my earrings, necklaces, and rings in one place. Speaking of necklaces, I just got a new silver one on Valentine's Day from my partner, and I'm excited to wear it to the upcoming wedding on March 15th. I also need to get my red cocktail dress altered before then - I booked an appointment with a tailor to shorten it.
